com.qmuiteam.qmui.util

类 QMUIViewOffsetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qmuiteam.qmui.util.QMUIViewOffsetHelper

  • public final class QMUIViewOffsetHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility helper for moving a View around using View#offsetLeftAndRight(int) and View#offsetTopAndBottom(int).

    Also the setting of absolute offsets (similar to translationX/Y), rather than additive offsets.

        Set the top and bottom offset for this QMUIViewOffsetHelper's view.
        参数:

        返回:
        true if the offset has changed
